Parameter.Name: Abdominal Cramps
Parameter.Description: “This is a dull aching or sharp pain in your abdomen that comes and goes.

Parameter.Name: Blood Glucose
Parameter.Description: “Blood glucose - also called blood sugar - is the main sugar found in the blood and the main source of energy for your body.”

Parameter.Name: Blood Pressure
Parameter.Description: “Blood pressure is the force of blood pushing against the walls of the arteries as your heart pumps blood.”
